item.description:
A summer poetry marathon featuring 88+ local and visiting poets reading over three days: Friday 7/30, 7-10 p.m. and Saturday 7/31, noon-10 p.m., at the Pierre Menard Gallery, and Sunday 8/1, noon-5 p.m. at OUTPOST 186.

The line-up includes Seth Abramson, Ana Bo≈æičević, Thom Donovan, Valerie Duff-Strauttman, Annie Finch, Greg Fuchs, Michael Gizzi, Peter Gizzi, Doug Holder, Joan Houlihan, Fanny Howe, Geof Huth, Mark Lamoureux, Fred Marchant, Ben Mazer, David Rivard, and many many more. Organized by Jim Behrle, Michael Carr, David Kirschenbaum, John Mulrooney, and Aaron Tieger.

A complete schedule is available at http://www.bostonpoet....
item.name: Boston Poet Tea Party reading marathon, session 2 of 3
